alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:10PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to locally 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers increase through the evening. Blowing and drifting snow will continue to produce significant impacts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
